text: Ride Along 2 is a 2016 American buddy cop action comedy movie directed by Tim Story and written by Phil Hay and Matt Manfredi. It is the sequel to the 2014 movie Ride Along. The movie stars Ice Cube, Kevin Hart, Ken Jeong, Benjamin Bratt, Olivia Munn, Bruce McGill and Tika Sumpter. Universal Pictures released the movie on January 15, 2016. Like the original film, this sequel was panned by most critics but was a box office success, grossing $124.6 million worldwide during its theatrical run. == Other websites == * Category:2016 action movies Category:2016 comedy movies Category:2010s action comedy movies Category:2010s buddy comedy movies Category:American action comedy movies Category:American buddy comedy movies Category:Buddy action movies Category:Buddy cop movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Tim Story Category:Movies set in Atlanta Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Ride Along 2
